name: Alliance of New Federation
startIntroPart1: Greetings, Dawn, leader of Alliance of New Federation. Since the begining of The alliance, from the humble refugee to the leader of many federation people, you have lead people the new hope and ever greater future. Now after the collapse of earth, you have lead you people to the space and arrive at this new world.
startIntroPart2: Dawn, there is new hope and glory for our people in this new planet. let us show the world, The alliance power and glory
declaringWar: you have go beyond our bottom limit, now you will face our might.
attacked: This is declaration of war, you will regret this.
defeated: The impossible has occurred. The alliance has fallen into ruin...
introduction: Greetings. I am Dawn, leader of Alliance of New Federation. I hope we can have good future together.
hateHello: State your business or vacate this frequency.
uniques: [Worker] units gain the [APD Center Kit] promotion
[+25]% Production when constructing [Military] units [in all cities]
Can spend Gold to annex or puppet a City-State that has been your ally for [5] turns.
